message: Let's split almost evenly, Bob, but consider the impact of inflation later in the game.  Take a bit less now to ensure we both get something!
Considering inflation, I'll take a bit more. You can still get a good amount if you accept now.
Bob, let's be realistic. Inflation is hurting us both. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Let's end this now!
I understand inflation is a concern, but I believe my offer is fair considering the time left.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm willing to take a slight hit to end this. Take a bit more and let's move on!
